A: 1. Organized sound is _ (a) Noise (b) Drama (c) Music

7. A church singing group is _ (a) Musician (b) Chorister
8. Unwanted sound is _ (a) Noise (b) Music

10. How many sound types are there? (a) 2 (b) 3 (c) 4
11. Who isn't in music? (a) Plumber (b) Singer
12. What doesn't make sound? (a) Head (b) Mouth (c) Hands
13. A trumpet player is a _ (a) Guitarist (b) Trumpeter
14. A guitar player is a _ (a) Guitarist (b) Doctor
15. Sounds come from living/non-living things (a) True (b) False
16. Sounds are heard, not seen (a) True (b) False
17. Singing makes _ (a) Noise (b) Music
18. Dancers follow music beats (a) True (b) False
19. How many voice parts are there? (a) 2 (b) 4 (c) 6
20. Sound is heard, not held (a) True (b) False
B: 2. Noise is unwanted _________ from our mouth.
